text: Noel Fielding (born 21 May 1973) is an English actor and comedian. He is currently a host of The Great British Bake Off, a British television programme. He has been a host since 2017. He works with other hosts, such as: Sandi Toksvig (2017–2020), Matt Lucas (2020-2022) and Alison Hammond (2023–present). title: Noel Fielding
